#include <cstdio>
#include <string>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
bool my(string a, string b)
{
	int x,y;
	string aa = a+b;
	string bb = b+a;
	return aa > bb;
}
 
int main()
{
	int t;
	int n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	getchar();
	while (t--) {
		scanf("%d",&n);
		getchar();
		int i = 0;
		string str;
		vector<string> vv;
		while (i < n) {
			cin >> str;
			getchar();
			vv.push_back(str);
			i++;
		}
		sort(vv.begin(),vv.end(),my);
		i = 0;
		while (i < n) {
			cout<<vv[i++];
		}
		cout<<endl;
		//vv.clear();
	}
	return 0;
}
